title: 5 Bedroom Apartment for Sale in Rajagiriya!
details:
REF NO: AFS0195

5 Bedroom Apartment for Sale in Rajagiriya!

Rare luxury 5 bedroom /5 bathroom combined unit for sale on the 5th floor of the newly completed "The Highness Rajagiriya" by Homelands Skyline.

Spanning approx.3000 Sq.ft, it is extremely spacious with ample light, and spread out living areas with a powder room, large pantry and dining area.

It is the largest and only such unit in the complex.

The apartment has 2 Master bedrooms. One of which is extra large with 2 balconies. Every bedroom has a balcony.

There is a seperate domestics room and bathroom, and the apartment comes with 2 parking slots.

The Highness consists of 4 floors of parking, and 37 apartments on 8 residential floors.

The roof top on the 8th floor has 2 penthouses, the pool area, a club house and an equipped gym.

Located on Rajagiriya road just 500m from Cotta rd, and 500m to Keells super on Dharmapala mawatha Rajagiriya. It is very close to numerous restaurants, department stores, and supermarkets.

This location is ideal as it has atleast 5 different routes that can be taken as short cuts to Ayurveda junction to go to Colombo, as well as shortcuts to Battaramulla, Parliament rd, Malabe high way exit, and there is a short cut to the Airport too.

Close to leading International schools - British School, CIS
as well as leading local schools.

Price of the property - 85 Million
Price is exclusive of legal fee and stamp duty fee
